item.description:
Let's meet for lunch at one of the few halfway decent Italian Restaurants in the State of Maine!!

Here is the link to the restaurant:

http://www.anjons.com/

...and their yum menu:

http://www.anjons.com/menus

 

If the weather is OK we can then go for a short walk on the nearby ET trail.

 

Subject to at least several of us signing up, so please be sure and check your e-mail Sunday morning before heading out to make sure that we are still on.

We will meet near my Silver Subaru Forester in the parking lot starting at 11:30 and go inside at 11:45 before it gets too busy with the Sunday lunch crowd.

Randy
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at Silver Subaru Forester in parking lot.
item.name: Lunch at Anjons!
